segments.text: Those kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get into so much trouble if their mom catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing when I was a kid, it's kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess or drop any cookies on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how kids can be so focused on getting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they're going to share the cookies or if one of them is going to hog them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
